data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Esmaeili-Rineh, Somayeh, Akmali, Vahid, Fathipour, Farajollah, Heidari, Nastaran, Rastegar-Pouyani, Nasrullah (2016): New distribution records of cave-dwelling gekkonid lizards (Sauria, Gekkonidae and Phyllodactylidae) in the Zagros Mountains of Iran. Subterranean Biology 18: 39-47, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/subtbiol.18.8185, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/subtbiol.18.8185
